_header: Man in the church not idle thou stand
_description: On the Use of the Rosary — ten couplets

BodTan407.First Lines:
Man in the Chirche not Idyll thow standebut take thy bedys in thyn
                    hande…
BodTan407.Last Lines:
…And whanne thow wylt no lenger stondeleve the bedys ther thow
                    hem fonde
